name: @t2cgroup/calculadora-proposta-mcp
description: Calculadora de Propostas T2C Group - MCP App com histórico de cotações

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app.html vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cross-env INPUT=mcp-app.html vite build --watch" "tsx watch main.ts"
scripts.start:http: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && node dist/index.js
scripts.start:stdio: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && node dist/index.js --stdio
